title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message:
Hi all,

a good 820-3476 wil it boot with no battery connected? charger only?

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message: Yes, But it will power cycle 3 times before post

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message: It will and it will NOT do the 3x on/off that is only 3437 and 3435. Of course it must have a 60W charger and the green/orange light must work.

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message:
thanks for clearing that,

so i got a 85W charger they all boot on this cable.

but this MacBook when i unplug the battery it boots, but it keeps giving a battery empty icon then turns off.

when i put in a good battery it boots and goes to the login screen shows the battery and % goes up.

when i unplug the battery i goes to the battery empty icon, but when i remove the io kabel the thick flat one it boots to login (still no battery pluged in)

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message: If it works and charges with the battery I wouldn't worry about it. It is normal on the 4924, not seen the battery symbol on the 3476 boards.

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message:
if i connect the black flat io cable, i get pp3v3_s0 at 0.051volt
most times system is giving issues at that point
also same result with different io kabel/board

so in my opinion there is a issue in the connector....

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message: Bad cable/connector/IO board. Or bad Airport card.

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message:
oke replaced connector, io board, io kabel and airport.

result is this,

no battery and black io board cable, system runs good and boots in few second.

when i plugin the black io cable, but no battery it boots 1 time turns off

when i plugin battery and black io cable
it boots for 3 times and then turns off.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message: What do you mean by "boots" You mean power cycle?

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message:
sorry indeed.

no battery and black io board cable, system runs good and boots in few second.   (full boot in os can do everything)

when i plugin the black io cable, but no battery it boots 1 time turns off (powercycle)

when i plugin battery and black io cable
it boots for 3 times and then turns off. (3 times powercycle)

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message: I have no idea. What is the board history?

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only

title: 820-3476 wont boot on charger only
message: Inspect trackpad connector for corrosion. Also this thread is a mess and I have no real idea what is what anymore. Start over.
